description:
Like way more supportive versions of your favourite flip-flops, and ready for the long haul. Whether you pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier, they deliver the same flexible shock-absorbing base. Arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step, because feeling good at sunset dance parties never goes out of style.

  • Smooth, soft and durable Birko-Flor synthetic leather uppers
  • Adjustable strap with buckle
  • Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management
  • Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet
  • Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing
  • Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps
  • EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks
name: Birkenstock Gizeh Birko-Flor Sandals - Women's
